summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing an op-ed piece and strategies for crisis management. Epstein suggests creating an internal team to handle potential crises and emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of an email from Jeffrey Epstein discussing crisis management strategies.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The email discusses an op-ed piece related to crisis management.
Epstein suggests creating an internal team to manage crises.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
